file.name: circular-references-subtree-resolver.yaml
file.content:
meta:
  title: "circular references - subtree resolver"
  only: true
cases:
- name: cross-document circular reference
  remoteDocuments:
    b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          Action:
            properties:
              confirmation:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation'
          ActionConfirmation:
            properties:
              dismiss_action:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Action"
  action:
    type: resolveSubtree
    config:
      obj:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              $ref: "./b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
      path: []
      opts:
        returnEntireTree: true
        baseDoc: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
              properties:
                confirmation:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation"
                  properties:
                    dismiss_action:
                      $ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
- name: cross-document circular reference with `useCircularStructures` set
  remoteDocuments:
    b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          Action:
            properties:
              confirmation:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation'
          ActionConfirmation:
            properties:
              dismiss_action:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Action"
  action:
    type: resolveSubtree
    config:
      obj:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              $ref: "./b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
      path: []
      opts:
        returnEntireTree: true
        useCircularStructures: true
        baseDoc: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
              properties: &circularRefAnchor
                confirmation:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation"
                  properties:
                    dismiss_action:
                      $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
                      properties: *circularRefAnchor
- name: already-resolved circular reference input
  description: should resolve the document one more level deep
  remoteDocuments:
    b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          Action:
            properties:
              confirmation:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation'
          ActionConfirmation:
            properties:
              dismiss_action:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Action"
  action:
    type: resolveSubtree
    config:
      obj:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
              properties:
                confirmation:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation"
                  properties:
                    dismiss_action:
                      $ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
      path: []
      opts:
        returnEntireTree: true
        baseDoc: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - only: true
    equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
              properties:
                confirmation:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation"
                  properties:
                    dismiss_action:
                      $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
                      properties:
                        confirmation:
                          $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation"
                          properties:
                            dismiss_action:
                              $ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"

Error: invalidYAML: yaml: line 90: anchor "circularRefAnchor" value contains itself
